name: Rulebreaker (Metalorian)
description:
Get your pen and paper ready, this is gonna be a tough one.

You know when you're playing a brand new board/card/dice game? You know how tricky it can be to learn the rules?

Now imagine if the person you're playing with didn't want to tell you all the rules. And the dice/cards/whatever were more like hieroglyphs.

Yeah.

Have fun!
